text: hananim-eul wihae jaemul-eul bachineun salam-eun han al-ui mil-algwa gat-eunii nat-al-i ilgob gaeui isag-eulo beonsighal geos-iyo mae isagmada baeg-yeogae ui nat-allo pungseonghagehayeo julila hananim-eun geu bun-i wonhaneun ja-ege myeochbaeui bosang-eul junani hananim-eun modeun geos-eul algo gyesinila
